messages.subject: Other kids' questions (was honesty vs. politeness)
messages.msgSnippet: Angela- We ve had that same kind of thing happen at our house. We had a new family move into our neighborhood a little less than a year ago. It is a dad who
messages.messageBody:
Angela-

We've had that same kind of thing happen at our house. We had a new family move into our neighborhood a little less than a year ago. It is a dad who has his two kids every other weekend. Well, the younger one is a girl, and she was in Kindergarten last year. When she was over here one day she told me something along the lines of, "Well, I just don't see how your kids are getting any smarter." A Kindergartener said that! I mean, they start indoctrinating them early, don't they??

Michelle
----- Original Message -----
From: autonomousangela
To: AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, June 06, 2005 6:40 AM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Re: Honesty VS Politeness?



The kids are happy and have a couple
new horsey friends. (one of whom keeps asking how many work sheets they have to do every day and doesn't quite understand that they don't have to do any.)



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
